mapper.update: update customer_intention_marks set intention_id = #{intentionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, custom_id = #{customId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, process_user_id = #{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process_user_name = #{processUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, intention_id, custom_id, created_at, process_user_id, process_user_name, content from customer_intention_marks where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, intention_id, custom_id, created_at, process_user_id, process_user_name, content from customer_intention_marks
